website_summaries.verdict: Howard Miller is a well-respected brand in the clock industry, and this model continues that tradition. Very stylish with a narrow profile that fits tight wall spaces. Keeps good time with minimal ticking.
pros: Nearly silent operation, even with pendulum in place
Clock face and hands easy to read from a distance
cons: Smaller and more delicate than it appears
Ornamental pendulum may or may not work
Some concerns about broken internal parts

customer_reviews.title: Defective time movement..... again
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning this clock. It's very pretty and just what I was looking for but the hands won't move. Pendulum swings just fine..... batteries weren't the problem. I called Howard Miller tech support and they said apparently defective movement
customer_reviews.author: Laura Line

customer_reviews.title: My Howard Miller beautiful wall cloc
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this clock - we had this in our house 12 years ago & lost it in a fire - sad to say - I forgot who designed the clock ... Then I was looking to find another wall clock & saw this one ! I was very pleased to find it again....its the style I like - the size and the color is perfect for my decore....its so easy to put together hardly any thing to assemble...run on 2 AA batteries always kept perfact time before - that's why I ordered it again.....I give it a 9.8
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. I had one like this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I had one like this years ago, and in moving over the years, I somewhat got rid of it or lost it. So glad to find this! It is very elegant, quiet, and reminds me of my original one years ago. Happy memories!
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! It's very fashionable. It was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock!
customer_reviews.text: Great clock. My other wooden clock had a pendulum that slammed against the sides of the wooden case and therefore disruptive to clients. This clock pendulum moves freely and is quiet. Very stylish and matches my decor perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: alcaryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent for a narrow wall
customer_reviews.text: Even though the description included all the right dimensions, this clock was a bit daintier than I expected. The clock face appears smaller than pictured, for some reason. The light background still makes it easy to read. I had a tricky time getting the batteries snug enough to keep the pendulum working, but eventually found success. As a whole effect, the accent on the top is diminished, compared to the design of the lower portion. Maybe it just appears a little out of proportion (bottom heavy, as is the nature of a pendulum)? The clock is quiet and I am still glad I chose it !
customer_reviews.author: katy ischia

customer_reviews.title: Great clock!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is great! It is perfect in my living area. Very stylish. Quiet. It was a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Everage

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really a very pretty and different clock have got a lot of compliments onit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clock needs a glass face
customer_reviews.text: Face of clock has a plastic cover. Cover has a smudge over almost almost half the face. Took it apart and tried to clean it. It is in the plastic and will not clean.
customer_reviews.author: Junious E Nichols Jr

customer_reviews.title: Wall Clock
customer_reviews.text: I actually received this awesome wall clock several months ago and is very please with, especially its quietness, and accurate time keep. Great value, quality worth all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new wall clock that would fit in a certain area. Wanted one similar to the one I had previously (had it for several years and finally "died"). This clock met my needs perfectly. Surprisingly it arrived before the promised ship date.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: EXPECTED MORE FROM HOWARD MILLER!
customer_reviews.text: I thought because this clock was made by Howard Miller it would be a great purchase for someone else. The clock is not made that well, but does seem to keep time. The pendulum is very fragile and really does not seem to work well. I took it off the clock. I think I am going to just purchase another clock by a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: StarryEyes

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant looking timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock and it is even more beautiful than when I viewed it online. It is very elegant, long and slender and looks like an antique timepiece. If there is a drawback at all (and this wasn't much of one) it had to do with the pendulum. You have to hang it just right - a little away from the wall so that the pendulum doesn't hit the wall and stop swinging. Other than that, no problem. I love it and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: E Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful time peace
customer_reviews.text: I love Howard Miller clock’s they keep time perfectly and this one is to replace an exact same one that I had for over 12 years
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clock looks good, it could be slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: The clock looks good, it could be slightly bigger, but ok. The quality is expected to be much better, especially when it comes to materials and assembly quality. Seconds hand have dropped off several times. When the clock case has been dismantled to fix it, some broken case parts been visible, however no broken details inside, meaning that such broken parts have been used at the factory. This is really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrijs Zelenins

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: I love the clock only disadvantage is the hook for hanging on the wall makes the clock hang to low. Wish it had 2 different hooks to choose from...just a thought.😊
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clock
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clock! Has worked perfect! Barely hear any noise form it which I like! It looks wonderful in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Hollib

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty clock but small for an entrance way. We returned it and ordered the Yvonne clock from Howard Miller.
customer_reviews.author: Maura B.

customer_reviews.title: Style and value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our home. I love it! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking clock, keeps time well. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Oorah

customer_reviews.title: This clock was just what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: This clock was just what I was looking for. It runs quietly and you do not hear the pendulum go back and forth. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If the pendulum isn't working, flip the battery!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps great time! Pendulum wasn't working, just thought I would flip the battery after trying everything else and whoolaaa! Works! yea
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen clock
customer_reviews.text: Clock is stylish and attractive and goes perfectly in our kitchen. It keeps very accurate time. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty clock
customer_reviews.text: Small size clock fits easily in narrow spaces. Large face, easy to see. Quiet pendulum movement. Difficult to force batteries into position. Overall very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LouisianaLady

customer_reviews.title: Pedulum Wouldn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Using brand new batteries and making sure the clock was hanging straight, I could get the pendulum to swing by pushing it but within ten minutes it was barely moving. Took a meter to the batteries to make sure they were good and they were. Tried again and same thing. Packaged the clock up and returned it. The clock was attractive but it just didn't work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Woltz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clock
customer_reviews.text: The clock arrived in perfect condition. It is simple yet beautiful and keeps perfect time. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but I can't get the pendulum to work.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm/Clock
customer_reviews.text: Attractive design and easy to put together. Packaged well and keeps good time. I have it in my kitchen but it looks good for anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Diva shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wall Clock
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for one of my bosses. She absolutely loved it and it looks perfect on her wall!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I love it! but the pendulum on the clock didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! but the pendulum on the clock didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe L.

customer_reviews.title: Great decor
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous clock, and easy to set up! Not too loud either
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Perfect color. My only problem was deciding which wall to put it on. I bought it for one area but liked it so much I could think of two more areas it would look great in. Looks like an antique.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Fran

customer_reviews.title: Miller Paulina Wall Clock
customer_reviews.text: My grandson slammed the door and my replica clock fell and broke. I went on Amazon and saw this Howard Miller clock which looked the same and ordered it. It arrived very quickly and is of very high quality. The pendulum swings and the clock itself looks regal. Of course, I paid more than the $20 replica, but it will last longer and looks very impressive. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Love the 1st clock. Returning the extras bought as gifts missing the swinging thing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the 1st clock. Works great. However bought extras for gifts and they were missing the swinging thing. Not happy. Returning. Keeping the one that works. Check the boxes ASAP to make sure everything is there and working. In my case I had missing pieces. So returning the extras I bought as gifts since missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: One of my fav purchases from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This clock is an awesome deal for the price and it looks so classy. I have it in my office and adore it. You can hear the clock itself ticking so I wouldn't recommend that for someone looking for a silent clock but the pendulum action is awesome and the clock is beautiful. I personally love the slight ticking sound. I find myself singing songs to the beat of it while I'm working.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: It’s about Time :)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, works like a charm and is really beautiful. It surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Great Styling of this Clock
customer_reviews.text: Love the styling of this clock! Had another one of this model for several years when the clock mechanism broke (I might have wound it wrong during Daylight Savings). Searched the Internet for the same one and was so pleased I found it!.
customer_reviews.author: coach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty; Keeps Time; Pendulum Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty clock. It keeps time well with brand new batteries. However, the pendulum does not work. Instructions were followed exactly, but it won't work. The clock was not packaged well for shipping (I also left packaging feedback) and I wonder if turbulence in the delivery process caused this.
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock!
customer_reviews.text: This clock looks very nice on the small section of the wall of put it on. You can NOT hear the pendulum, which is what I was hoping (I read the reviews prior to ordering, and the reviewers said it was quiet, and it is!). It keeps accurate time, and was a piece of cake to hang... NO assembly except for just placing the pendulum on the back... easy, peasy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I like this clock
customer_reviews.text: I like this clock! It looks elegant and what stands out is that the pendulum swings are impressive.... It looks good and had a clear visible face to be seen froma far. Although my young kids had difficulty telling time as no numbers on the dial...
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: This clock is beautifully made and very quiet even though it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This clock is beautifully made and very quiet even though it has a swinging pendulum. The face is a little small to see across the room however the numbers are very visible. I would definitely recommend this as a great purchase. I'm very happy with mine!
customer_reviews.author: DLH-PA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clock but I wish I had paid more attention to size. Seems small and more delicate than appearance. But still nice.
customer_reviews.author: thebrat74

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. Howard Miller is the best. I bought this clock for my sister-in-law because she fell in love with mine. The detail is very nice. I actually turned my pendulum around so it is black instead of gold. This is my third Howard Miller clock. I also have a Grandfather clock and mantle clock and they keep perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: Review from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great and it is quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother and she loves it. Works great, looks great and it is quiet
customer_reviews.author: nice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the place on the wall where it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the place on the wall where it is now hanging! Looks good, keeping perfect time and I love the pendulum.
customer_reviews.author: Claire J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I don't know how well it works, but it looked really nice. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clock
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, quiet and keeps perfect time. Looks great on the narrow wall in my living room. I am very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: West Lakes Surgery Center

customer_reviews.title: Lovee it
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock because it looks so naturally and make my living room looks attractive. I do definitely to recommend you to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock! It is a lovely design and is everything I had hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: dancingpapillioni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than on the picture, quiet and nice. But
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Pendulum NEVER worked!
customer_reviews.text: Order clock, received clock, put in batteries....the pendulum NEVER worked. Tried new batteries, still would not work. Expected much better from a Howard Miller clock. Highly recommend that you do not purchase this clock!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hughes Ruckman

product_meta.title: Howard Miller Paulina Wall Clock 625-296 – Modern & Round with Pendulum & Quartz Movement
feature_bullets: WALL CLOCK: This Paulina Wall Clock has a pendulum bob finished in antique gold, suspended on a charcoal gray-finished pendulum to match your home decor. The clock’s quartz movement makes a soft ticking noise without the use of chimes for a quieter environment.

DURABLE: This indoor modern clock is created to last. It has a sturdy metal frame to relieve stress in a busy household. Display the wrought iron clock with decorative leaves in your kitchen, office, bathroom, bedroom, living room, and more.

HIGH QUALITY: The vintage design shows traditional roman numerals, with IIII instead of IV, to become a home essential. Easily tell time with the black Roman numerals, spade hands, and convex acrylic crystal to stand out over the aged dial and charcoal gray-finished bezel among gold highlights.

DIMENSIONS: The height of this clock is 23.5 inches (60 cm), with a width of 8.25 inches (21 cm) and a depth of 2.5 inches (6 cm). It is powered by quartz movement and requires two AA sized battery (not included).

HOWARD MILLER: Founded in 1926, this company is known for its tradition and generational products. Located in Zeeland, Michigan, Howard Miller provides attention to detail from quality timepieces to handmade collectors cabinets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars118 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
